Title: Hysterical Blindness
Plot: Samuel prepares for new additions to his family, while Lydia warns him of the consequences. Claire discovers that her roommate Gretchen may have a hidden agenda. Meanwhile, Peter finds an unexpected way to connect with Emma, who would prefer to stay distant. Elsewhere, a different side of Sylar emerges as he desperately tries to remember the person he used to be.
GuestStars: Louise Fletcher, Madeline Zima, Ray Park, Dawn Olivieri, Deanne Bray, Christine Adams, Tessa Thompson, Rachel Melvin, Ernie Hudson, Jack Wallace, Sydney Sweeney
